com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent.StatTracker

Class AggregateRunningStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent.StatTracker.AggregateRunningStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AggregateRunningStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class stores the aggregated statistics of a user. It can be updated by passing it a runningstatistics object. This class should never be called directly, only via the AggregateRunningStatisticsHandler. Created by hendrikdepauw on 29/03/2017.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
